edu.cuny.cat.market.charging
Class MultiDayExploringMonitor

java.lang.Object
  edu.cuny.cat.market.charging.TraderExploringMonitor
      edu.cuny.cat.market.charging.MultiDayExploringMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuctionEventListener, Parameterizable, Resetable
public class MultiDayExploringMonitor
extends TraderExploringMonitor
implements Resetable

a trader exploration monitor that decides based solely on the trader distribution among markets over a certain number of days.

Parameters

base.threshold
double (0.6 by default)		 (a threshold value as a filter to decide whether traders are exploring or not)
base.threshold
double (0.6 by default)		 (a threshold value as a filter to decide whether traders are exploring or not)

Default Base

multi_day_exploring_monitor

Version:
$Revision: 1.9 $
Author:
Jinzhong Niu
